an7.66:1.1: Seven suns (_sattasuriya_) are mentioned in Arthavaveda 13.3.10a (_sūryā sapta_), in reference to the sun’s “seven bay steeds” (Arthavaveda 13.2.23), or “seven fine steeds” (Maitrāyaṇī Saṁhitā 4.12.4).
an7.66:3.2: BB appears to omit kadaci karahaci etc here, it is in the following sections.
an7.66:12.2: BB (original edition) has a typo here, the close quote is omitted.
